name: bobassembly
title: Bob's Assembling machines mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod

This mod adds assembling machines 4, 5 and 6, and updates the recipe for assembling machine 3 to fit my progression pattern.
The mod also adds higher tiers of Electric furnace, Chemical plant and Oil refinery.
It also includes the Electronic assembling machine chain, and additional tiers of machines added by Bob's Metals, Chemicals and Intermediates mod.

Designed to work best with my full mod pack.
All additional machine tiers other than assembling machines can be turned off in the mod options.
